Capture image from camera Capture video from camera Select image from gallery Select video from gallery Select your choice Please free up some space on device before proceeding
Allow Deny Cancel Settings
Camera and Storage permission is required to access camera and select images from gallery. Without the Camera and Storage permission camera and gallery will not work. You previously selected to never ask again for Camera and Storage permission. You have to manually grant them from the app settings.
Storage permission is required to select files from local storage. Without the Storage permission, file selection will not work. You previously selected to never ask again for Storage permission. You have to manually grant it from the app settings.
Please select a smaller video. Maximum size should not exceed 200 MB Please select a smaller image. Maximum size should not exceed 25 MB.
Location permission required to access your current location and showing results accordingly. Need to turn on by clicking settings button from below.
Please grant location permission to start the service You have not granted location permission. So the service cannot be started. settings No internet Please make sure that you have active internet connection. No Google Play Service found. Please install it.
